text.2_Part II, 1_Variants in Targum Onkelos,: "Hear, O Israel, accept, O Israel" (שמע ישראל קבל ישראל). This is the language of the Sefer HaChinuch (Mitzvah 2): "It is a positive commandment to believe and listen, which is the acceptance that He is One," as it says, "Hear, O Israel, the Lord our God, the Lord is One" (Deuteronomy 6:4). "Hear" (שמע) can be understood as "accept" in this context.
